mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_board (bno, infotext, category, serving, difficulty, cookingtime) VALUES (common_board_seq.currval, #{infotext}, #{category}, #{serving}, #{difficulty}, #{cookingtime})
mapper.select: SELECT cb.bno, cb.title, cb.writer, cb.regdate, cb.viewcnt, cb.replycnt, cb.uuid, cb.uploadpath, cb.filename, rb.infotext, rb.category, rb.serving, rb.difficulty, rb.cookingtime, rb.heartcnt FROM common_board cb JOIN recipe_board rb ON cb.bno = rb.bno WHERE cb.bno = #{bno}

SELECT bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, replycnt, uuid, uploadpath, filename, heartcnt FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(common_board COMMON_BOARD_BNO_PK) */ cb.bno, cb.title, cb.writer, cb.regdate, cb.viewcnt, cb.replycnt, cb.uuid, cb.uploadpath, cb.filename, rb.heartcnt rownum AS rn FROM common_board cb INNER JOIN recipe_board rb ON cb.bno = rb.bno WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND cb.boardId = 2 ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM common_board WHERE bno > 0 AND boardId = 2
